contents.text: Thank you for calling MindSource, your top tier technical staffing and consulting agency in South Bay.
For job seekers looking for technical roles, press 1.
To speak directly with a recruitment specialist, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a recruitment specialist.

navigationGoals: Connect me with a recruiter to discuss potential tech roles.
I’d like to speak with a recruiter about transitioning my military IT experience into a civilian technical role.
Connect me with a recruitment specialist to discuss my software engineering job placement strategy.
I would like to speak with a recruitment specialist about finding a technical job.
I’d like to speak with a recruiter about physics-focused roles.

contents.text: To hear about our current open positions, press 2.
Please hold while we retrieve the latest job listings for you.

navigationGoals: Retrieve the most recent technical job openings you have.
I want to hear your latest technical job openings that match a military cybersecurity background.
Provide me with the latest list of active technical job openings in the Bay Area.
I want to hear about your current open tech positions.
Can you share your current openings for entry-level technical positions?

contents.text: For hiring companies seeking expert IT staffing solutions, press 2.
To discuss your workforce needs with an account manager, press 1.
One moment please while we connect you with an account manager.

navigationGoals: Let me speak to an account manager about staffing IT roles.
I need to discuss staffing needs for my veteran-founded startup and hire IT specialists.
I need to speak with an account manager about our enterprise IT staffing requirements.
I need to talk to an account manager about hiring IT staff for my business.
I need to discuss staffing undergraduate interns for my research lab.

contents.text: To learn more about our consulting services, press 2.
Please hold while we provide information about our technical consulting services.

navigationGoals: Provide me information on your technical consulting services.
I’m interested in your technical consulting services to help modernize my small business’s IT systems.
Send me details on your system architecture consulting and technical advisory services.
I would like to learn more about your IT consulting services.
I’m interested in learning about your technical consulting services for a physics project.
